    </map>

    <script>
        window.addEventListener("load", function() {
            var img = document.getElementById("wallpaper");
            var areas = document.querySelectorAll("area");
            
            img.onload = function() {
                var imgWidth = img.offsetWidth;
                var imgHeight = img.offsetHeight;

                areas.forEach(function(area) {
                    var coords = area.getAttribute("data-rect").split(",");
                    var newCoords = coords.map(function(val, index) {
                        return index % 2 === 0 ? (parseFloat(val) / 940) * imgWidth : (parseFloat(val) / 590) * imgHeight;
                    });

                    area.setAttribute("coords", newCoords.join(","));
                });
            };

            img.src = img.src; // Trigger image load again in case it's already cached.
        });
    </script>

</body>
</html>
